availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, attorney. Bullitt County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Simmons and Mary Winston Simmons. Married Eugenia Price Simmons in 1853. Attorney in Grant County from c1841 to 1885.

ab.bibl: Find A Grave, "Winston T. Simmons (1823-1888)," Memorial #118769393, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=118769393&ref=acom (accessed March 17, 2017). W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: History of the State, (Louisville; Chicago: F.A. Battey and Company, 1887), p. 883.
